title: The Turnt Table
detail: Things are about to get groovy.
extended_details: We will be making a custom turntable that can be controlled with a mobile phone. The turntable base will be custom built with a raspberry pi controlling the motors and receiving controls from a mobile app. The turn table will also feature an led visualizer, and will be able to stream the analog music to a digital device.
